Text: In the US thay say: "awesome" and in UK thay say "Jolly good" - lol

Thanks BBS, your uploads are always varied and useful. 

I imagine you have a lot of ebooks (an understatement). What software do you use to manage them?

Thanks again.

Hello vuddha,

Well actually,I don't use software to manage my books.It would be almost  impossible,time wise to put them all in a software program.All my books are on my personal servers approx 300,000 books and I get new ones every day.

I don't read as much  as I would like to due to time,with uploading,kids and running a business,my time pretty much is gone.

I do suggest you try "Calibre'' it free and seems to be popular :)

Thanks BBS. Was going to try Calibre, but thought you might have a better solution. 

Keep up the good work!
